dashboard.label: Body Demo Dark
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| gentimes start=-1 end=-0 increment=1h earliest=-24h latest=now 
| rename starttime AS _time
| fields - starthuman endhuman endtime
| eval count=(random() % 500)/100+35
| fields count
","queryParameters":{"refresh":"10s"}},"name":"temp1"},"search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| gentimes start=-1 end=-0 increment=1h earliest=-24h latest=now 
| rename starttime AS _time
| fields - starthuman endhuman endtime
| eval count=(random() % 20) + 75","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-15m","refresh":"10s","latest":"now"}},"name":"heart"},"search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| gentimes start=-1 end=-0 increment=1h earliest=-24h latest=now 
| rename starttime AS _time
| fields - starthuman endhuman endtime
| eval sugar=(random() % 3)+1 / 3 + 3
| fields _time sugar","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-15m","refresh":"10s","latest":"now"}},"name":"Sabrina"},"search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("body.blood.pressure.systolic{}") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_bodym" span=5s BY "name{}"
| timechart avg("body.blood.pressure.systolic{}") span=5s useother=false BY "name{}" WHERE max in top5
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}},"search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| gentimes start=-1 end=-0 increment=1h earliest=-24h latest=now 
| rename starttime AS _time
| fields - starthuman endhuman endtime
| eval "diastolic"=random()%10+77
| eval "systolic"=random()%20+10
| fields _time "diastolic" "systolic"
| table _time systolic diastolic","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-15m","latest":"now"}},"name":"Blutdruck"},"ds_v6eaCKxQ_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("body.temperature{}") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_bodym" span=5s 
| timechart avg("body.temperature{}") AS "Body Temperature" span=5s ","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-15m","latest":"now","refresh":"10s"}},"name":"temp copy 1"},"ds_BacPYxMn_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| gentimes start=-1 end=-0 increment=1h earliest=-24h latest=now 
| rename starttime AS _time
| fields - starthuman endhuman endtime
| eval count=(random() % 3)+100 / 3 /100 + 3
| fields count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-15m","latest":"now","refresh":"10s"}},"name":"Sugar Sabrina"},"ds_DBhB6g1G":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| makeresults count=3
| streamstats count
| eval _time=_time-(count*86400*3)
| eval score = random()%3 +1
| eval status = case(score=1,"chocolate for lunch", score=2, "big cake", score=3, "status cleared")
| eval color = case(score=1,"#f44271", score=2, "#f4a941", score=3, "#41f49a")
| table _time status color"},"name":"annotations1"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":700,"backgroundColor":"#000000","width":1300,"showTitleAndDescription":false},"structure":[{"item":"viz_5f0x6oMz","type":"block","position":{"x":-90,"y":0,"w":1320,"h":680}},{"item":"viz_bloodsugar","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":10,"w":220,"h":680}},{"item":"viz_mHlJChdX","type":"block","position":{"x":720,"y":0,"w":330,"h":690}},{"item":"viz_blood_pressure_chart","type":"block","position":{"x":740,"y":0,"w":530,"h":440}},{"item":"viz_lFLJuSik","type":"block","position":{"x":200,"y":0,"w":40,"h":690}},{"item":"viz_lUFHNAH5","type":"block","position":{"x":210,"y":500,"w":220,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_chart1","type":"block","position":{"x":190,"y":0,"w":250,"h":150}},{"item":"chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":220,"y":270,"w":160,"h":110}},{"item":"viz_8CQvCyuu","type":"block","position":{"x":750,"y":390,"w":530,"h":290}},{"item":"viz_NenreFJH","type":"block","position":{"x":760,"y":390,"w":510,"h":290}}],"globalInputs":[]},"title":"Body
